vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional engineering services contract with RS&H, Inc. to provide additional design services for traffic signal and intersection improvements at Cesar Chavez Boulevard and Canton Street - Not to exceed $249,725.00, from $294,265.50 to $543,990.50 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
